metadata.name: Flo AI Tools - Studio Format
metadata.description: Tools exported in Flo AI Studio compatible format

tools.name: execute_redshift_query
tools.description: Execute a SQL query on Redshift database and return results (Provider: Amazon Redshift, Category: Database - Redshift)

tools.name: execute_batch_redshift_queries
tools.description: Execute multiple SQL queries in a batch on Redshift database (Provider: Amazon Redshift, Category: Database - Redshift)

tools.name: get_redshift_table_schema
tools.description: Get schema information for a Redshift table (Provider: Amazon Redshift, Category: Database - Redshift)

tools.name: list_redshift_tables
tools.description: List all tables in a Redshift schema (Provider: Amazon Redshift, Category: Database - Redshift)

tools.name: get_redshift_table_info
tools.description: Get comprehensive information about a Redshift table including row count and size (Provider: Amazon Redshift, Category: Database - Redshift)

tools.name: test_redshift_connection
tools.description: Test the Redshift connection and return connection status (Provider: Amazon Redshift, Category: Database - Redshift)

tools.name: get_redshift_connection_info
tools.description: Get Redshift connection configuration information (Provider: Amazon Redshift, Category: Database - Redshift)

tools.name: execute_bigquery_query
tools.description: Execute a SQL query on BigQuery and return results (Provider: Google BigQuery, Category: Database - BigQuery)

tools.name: execute_batch_bigquery_queries
tools.description: Execute multiple SQL queries in a batch on BigQuery (Provider: Google BigQuery, Category: Database - BigQuery)

tools.name: get_bigquery_table_schema
tools.description: Get schema information for a BigQuery table (Provider: Google BigQuery, Category: Database - BigQuery)

tools.name: list_bigquery_datasets
tools.description: List all datasets in a BigQuery project (Provider: Google BigQuery, Category: Database - BigQuery)

tools.name: list_bigquery_tables
tools.description: List all tables in a BigQuery dataset (Provider: Google BigQuery, Category: Database - BigQuery)

tools.name: get_bigquery_table_info
tools.description: Get comprehensive information about a BigQuery table including row count and size (Provider: Google BigQuery, Category: Database - BigQuery)

tools.name: test_bigquery_connection
tools.description: Test the BigQuery connection and return connection status (Provider: Google BigQuery, Category: Database - BigQuery)

tools.name: get_bigquery_project_info
tools.description: Get BigQuery project information and connection configuration (Provider: Google BigQuery, Category: Database - BigQuery)

tools.name: create_bigquery_dataset
tools.description: Create a new BigQuery dataset (Provider: Google BigQuery, Category: Database - BigQuery)

tools.name: delete_bigquery_dataset
tools.description: Delete a BigQuery dataset (Provider: Google BigQuery, Category: Database - BigQuery)
